name: Wall Jumper (DrawN)
description:
This is just a simple game that'll let you jump from wall to wall at your heart's content. 

Controls

When grounded

Jump - W/Up arrow

Left & Right - A/Left arrow & D/Right arrow

When climbing walls

Up & Down - W/Up arrow & S/Down arrow

Jumping to opposite wall - Left Mouse Click (on opposite wall)

The game starts when your player first hits the wall. The longer you play, the faster the camera will move.

Feedback is appreciated!
